document.full_text: rafa nadal and novak djokovic will clash at the rome masters in another dream showpiece on clay after winning their semi-finals on saturday in vastly different circumstances with the french open just over a week away.
document.title: djokovic battles past gutsy murray to set up nadal final
lines_and_colors: rafa nadal and novak djokovic will clash at the rome masters in another dream showpiece on clay after winning their semi-finals on saturday in vastly different circumstances with the french open just over a week away.
